title: How does a Support get an S??

replies.body:
1. upgrade your trinket 
I'm not kidding as far as I know if you finish a game where you are lvl 9 or above and didn't upgrade your trinket you can't get an S+
I got a S+ on lux support going 5/1/21 with a 23 minute game if that helps.

You know that if you lose the game you can still get an S but you will not get a box because of the loss.
I have also won on twitch and found that I only got an A+ when 3 of my team got an S, but I had more combat contribution then the whole team.
I went 20/9/12 on middle Twitch.
I can't find anywhere that says you cannot earn a chest on a loss, that seems to apply to keys only. Of course, it's much more likely to get a high grade like S with a win, so there is that.

I don't have a screenshot of the postgame like yours, but I went back to the match history to find this http://matchhistory.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/OC1/127209487/200146072?tab=stats

I remember that it was an S or an S+.

The mastery system will be comparing you to all other Lux Support players. It is easier to get a higher grade with off-meta picks, and uncommon or new champions. With someone like Lux I imagine a higher grade is achievable with some kills added on, not that you want to as a support, but she's bursty so it happens.

My top 3 supports have gotten A, A+ and S so far as passive supports (Janna, Lulu, Soraka) [This was my Soraka game](http://matchhistory.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/OC1/126826532/200862152?tab=overview), where admittedly I did have more kills than I usually would as her.

Ultimately... play better than everyone else? Haha xD It is a little tricky on supports, the system seems to weigh your CS score in pretty heavily from what I've seen.

cos you are playing lux iv worked it out that its to do with score and champ so if you play {{champion:12}} and get that score you will get a s were if you play {{champion:42}} you will not, I played a game were I went 7/1/5 on {{champion:136}}=s- and then 9/1/17 on{{champion:267}}=a+ don't ask me how I think its just to do with who you play as lux is not a sup well not by riots logic

It depends on where you rank among other players scores on that champ in that role. It also depends on more than just KDA. We had a pretty good discussion about it here: http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/6WbpJ9nE-why?comment=0000
Yes, it's definitely possible. I've scored quite a few S scores with Blitzcrank - one night I got two in a row, only got an A+ in my third game :(
i got 3 s ranks in 7 games on fiddle sticks support.
It's not impossible. Ive done it a few times... just keep trying.

You will have a very hard time with Lux unless you get kills, since it's based on other people who have played Lux sup and generally they get kills (Even more so because of her ult)
I have gotten ALL my S's since the update as support (Not joking) so it's not hard. They were however: Fiddle Support, Amumu Sup and Morgana (all rare picks, except perhaps Morgana)
And I usually have a few kills.

I don't recommend playing off picks in ranked but do it in a normal and see how you go man :P

You did do REALLY well though and in all fairness that should have been S and definitely would be on another champ I believe
Sadly I think "support" Lux's that go 20/1 impacted it badly for you </3

Because lux is a "support" it's hard to get S ranking's without actually stealing kills.

The clarification here is that "support" is generally the burst oriented supports (Brand, Lux, LB, Annie etc.) that tend to have an easier time getting kills then giving them, and tend to build more AP oriented.
